EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Webinar_Intro to Pivotal One_Q114.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: The Platform for Building Great Software 1/30
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for our webinar event, The Platform to Build Great Software, on January 30, 2014. Event Details: Date: Thursday, January 30, 2014 Time: 1:00PM CST
Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=666784963>
Event Number: 666 784 963
Teleconferencing Information:
- Live streaming will be available - US Toll Free: +1-855-749-4750 - US Toll: +1-415-655-0001 - Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=107432872&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 666 784 963
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:tsimpson@gopivotal.com>.
Regards,
Tony Simpson Account Manager - Central Region tsimpson@gopivotal.com <mailto:tsimpson@gopivotal.com> (512) 568-3787 <tel:%28512%29%20568-3787>
Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit Our Blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/>
Delivering Pivotal One Read More >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/paas>
